### R语言作用域

 
```{r}
w <- 8
f <- function(y){
  d <- 8
  h(d,y)
}

h <- function(dee, yyy){
  print(ls())
  print(ls(envir = parent.frame(n=1)))
  dee*(w + yyy)
}
f(2)
```
